verbose_text: Furthermore, treatment with both siR-beta-catenin and cisplatin further decreased the migratory and invasive capabilities of the T47D and MCF-7 cells, indicating that downregulation of beta-catenin may enhance the antitumor effect of cisplatin (XREF_FIG).
evidence: siR-beta-catenin and cisplatin further decreased the migratory and invasive capabilities of the T47D and MCF-7 cells, indicating that downregulation of beta-catenin may enhance the antitumor effect of cisplatin
